abstract: Drugs to raise so-called good cholesterol may still have a future despite the failure last year of an experimental treatment from Pfizer, researchers said.
snippet: Drugs to raise so-called good cholesterol may still have a future despite the failure last year of an experimental treatment from Pfizer, researchers said.
lead_paragraph: ORLANDO, Fla., Nov. 5 — Drugs to raise so-called good cholesterol may still have a future despite the widely publicized failure last year of an experimental cholesterol treatment from Pfizer, researchers said at a heart conference here.

headline.main: Hunt for Cholesterol Drug Is Not Over
